text: Silverchair was a rock band from Newcastle, Australia. The band's members were Daniel Johns, Chris Joannou and Ben Gillies, and were only around 12 and 13 when they founded the band. Silverchair is the only artist to score five number-one albums in the Australian Charts. Their studio albums are Frogstomp, Freak Show, Neon Ballroom, Diorama and Young Modern. The band has released many singles, their number-one singles being "Tomorrow", "Freak" and "Straight Lines".https://australian-charts.com/showinterpret.asp?interpret=Silverchair == References == Category:1990s Australian music groups Category:2000s Australian music groups Category:2010s Australian music groups Category:Australian rock bands Category:Boy bands Category:Grunge bands Category:Musical groups disestablished in 2011 Category:Musical groups established in 1992 Category:Musical groups from New South Wales Category:Post-grunge bands Category:1992 establishments in Australia Category:2010s disestablishments in Australia
title: Silverchair
